A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Underwhelming. I LOVE all Star Wars movies \, 1-6 and Rogue One\, I thought 7 was really good\, but kinda was waiting on 8 to see where it was going. 8 was pathetic. I mean\, its like Rian Johnson was bullied all his life by Star Wars fans\, and this was his way of getting back at them...
